qa_pairs.question: Have you had direct involvement with fundraising, investor relations, or presenting to VCs/private equity for capital raises?
qa_pairs.answer: I was on the other side of the table. While I was with SIlver Lake, I sat in on many management presentations soliciting an investment from Silver Lake. I learnt what to do and what not to do.

qa_pairs.question: Have you worked on products involving robotics, autonomous navigation, or hardware-integrated AI systems?
In any of your startup roles (e.g., Jaxtr, Upwork, 33Across), did you build the founding team or hire the first engineers from scratch?
qa_pairs.answer: In 33Across, I built the front-end team and hired the engineers from scratch.

qa_pairs.question: Were you involved in any IPO readiness or public market preparation in your Silver Lake portfolio companies?
qa_pairs.answer: I helped one of my portfolio companies prepare sell-side materials for potential buyers and acquirers.

qa_pairs.question: What was the largest budget or capital program you directly managed in an early-stage context?
qa_pairs.answer: My early-stage startups did not have direct budget. At Financial Engines, I managed a marketing budget >$50M.
